name: SwapArcade (Ludum Dare 27)
description:
Free Download! Created for Ludum Dare 27!

This game swaps between 4 different classic arcade inspired games every ten seconds, but keeps the same objects in play from each previous game, and changes their behaviors. You'll see what I mean!

Controls are the Arrow Keys and Space bar. The controls change depending on the game currently in play, shouldn't be too difficult to figure out :)

This Ludum Dare entry is a bit of a mess, haha. I got tired of making it half way through, so I added in funny/stupid nonsense instead of improving the actual game, but I still think it was an interesting concept at least... Enjoy!
